content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Overcharge your Mech's system to gain +1 Accuracy, +10% Damage, -10% Heat Generated and cool 40 Heat. Generate 10 Extra Heat per turn during the 4 Turn Cooldown.

content.prevOriginal: ACTION: A deadly precision Attack with 50% extra damage, +2 chance to hit and 30% reduced DFA self damage. Works for both DFA and Melee attacks. 4 turn cooldown with -1 defense. +1 Ini Injury&Melee Resist.

Рукоп. атаки наносят на 10% больше урона.

content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Gain enhanced ability to avoid damage for 2 turns, with a flat +2 increase in evasion with any movement. This can exceed your maximum allowed. Visibility and Signature reduced by 50% for the duration. Has a 5 turn cooldown.

content.original: ACTION: Gain +2 Local ECM and -50% Visibility/SensorSignature for 2 Turns. Has a 3 turn cooldown. Resolve Cost: {10}
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Gain +2 Local ECM and -50% Visibility/SensorSignature for 2 Turns. Has a 3 turn cooldown.
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: даёт себе +2 ECM и -50% к визуальной и сенсорной заметности на 2 хода. Перезарядка 3 хода. Решимости нужно: {10}

content.original: PASSIVE: Remove one bar of stability damage when Reserving. +1 Initiative, +1 Adv Sensors, +10% Sight and Sensor Range
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Remove one bar of stability damage when Reserving.  +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls.
content.content: ПАССИВНО: при пропуске хода убирает 1 полоску нестабильности. +1 инициативы, +1 Adv Sensors, +10% дальность видения и сенсоров

content.original: PASSIVE: Remove one bar of stability damage when Reserving. +1 Adv. Sensors, +1 Initiative.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Remove one bar of stability damage when Reserving.  +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls.
content.content: ПАССИВНО: при пропуске хода убирает 1 полоску нестабильности. +1 Adv. Sensors, +1 инициативы.

content.original: PASSIVE: +15% Max Sight/Sensor Range, +1 Adv. Sensors, +1 Initiative.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: +15% Max Sight/Sensor.  +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls.
content.content: ПАССИВНО: +15% макс. дальн. обзора и сенсоров, +1 Adv. Sensors, +1 инициативы.

content.original: Lancemates Receive Night Vision, +1 Probe, -1 Jamming, +10% Sight/Sensors, +1 Initiative
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Remove one bar of stability damage when Reserving.  +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls.
content.content: Члены отряда получают ночное видение, +1 к проверкам сенсора, -1 клин, +10% к обзору/сенсорам, +1 инициативы

content.original: ACTION: For 2 Turns, Company units gain +1 Probe, +20% Sensors/Sight, +2 to Initiative. Has a 3 turn cooldown. Stack 2 times. Stacks with other effects granting same bonuses. Resolve Cost: {10}
content.prevOriginal: +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls. ACTION: For 2 Turns, Lancemates have +1 Sensor and +15% Sensors/Sight. Has a 3 turn cooldown.
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: на два хода отряд получает +1 к проверкам сенсора, +20% к сенсорам/обзору, +2 инициативы. Перезарядка 3 хода. Стакается дважды. Стакается с другими эффектами, дающими те же бонусы. Решимости нужно: {10}

content.original: ACTION: Select a target within sensor rage to reveal it until the end of the current round, remove 1 of its EVASIVE charges and Double its Signature and Visibility. Does not End Your Turn. Resolve Cost: {10}
content.prevOriginal: +1 to Initiative and Tactics Rolls. ACTION: Select a target within sensor range to reveal it until the end of the current round, remove 1 of its EVASIVE charges and Double its Signature and Visibility. Does not End Your Turn.
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: выберите цель в радиусе сенсора, чтобы подсветить ее до конца раунда. Снимает с цели 1 шеврон уклонения и удваивает её заметность для радаров и обзора. Не заканчивает ваш ход. Решимости нужно: {10}

content.original: PASSIVE: Called Shots taken by this MechWarrior are twice as likely to hit the targeted location.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Called Shots taken by this MechWarrior are twice as likely to hit the targeted location.
content.content: ПАССИВНО: точность выстрелов Offensive Push этого мехвоина удвоена.

content.original: PASSIVE: Called Shots taken by this MechWarrior are almost guaranteed to hit their location .
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Called Shots taken by this MechWarrior are almost guaranteed to hit their location .
content.content: ПАССИВНО: Offensive Push выстрелы, сделанные этим мехвоином почти гарантированно попадают в цель.

content.original: ACTION: Cannot be used if you have moved this turn. Set movement to 0 this turn. Reduce all incoming damage by 75% for 1 turn and 25% on the second turn. Resolve Cost: {10}
content.prevOriginal: ACTION: Cannot be used if you have moved this turn. Set movement to 0 this turn. Reduce all incoming damage by 75% for 1 turn and 25% on the second turn. Resolve Cost: {10}
content.content: АКТИВАЦИЯ: (нельзя использовать, если вы уже двигались в этом ходу) перемещение = 0 в этом ходу. Снижает весь входящий урон на 75% на этот ход и на 25% на следующем ходу. Решимости нужно: {10}

content.original: This unit ignores landmines and fire this turn.
content.prevOriginal: This unit ignores landmines and fire this turn.
content.content: Этот юнит игнорирует мины и пожар в этом ходу.
